properties.name: itemStyle
properties.description: The style of the anchor, represented as a key-value pair object.
properties.rawdescription: The style of the anchor, represented as a key-value pair object.

properties.name: show
properties.rawdescription: Indicates whether to show the anchor.

properties.name: showAbove
properties.description: Indicates whether to show the anchor above the gauge.
properties.rawdescription: Indicates whether to show the anchor above the gauge.

properties.name: sizeRatio
properties.description: The size of the anchor as a ratio relative to the container size. Overrides the size property when set.
properties.rawdescription:
The size of the anchor as a ratio relative to the container size.
Overrides the `size` property when set.
